definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to see the light again (idiom); delivered from oppression
all black, no daylight (idiom); a world without justice

sentences.english: Big sister Jane follows to push the giant cliffs, hurriedly block.
sentences.chinese: 大妹見天貞要把擎天推下山崖，急忙阻止。

sentences.english: Grandpa is a happy guy, who goes to fish in the pond every day.
sentences.chinese: 爺爺見天都要去池塘釣魚，真是個快樂的老人。

sentences.english: If you attack the Pentagon, you might want to hide.
sentences.chinese: 如果你襲擊了五角大樓，你就別想重見天日。

sentences.english: The Good Views Heaven : What does this mean?
And you should be thankful that me and Ryan can lift your music out of its obscurity.
sentences.chinese: 我和雷恩能讓你的作品得以見天日你該感激涕零纔是。

sentences.english: An immigration amnesty has enabled many illegal residents in the U.
sentences.chinese: 移民大赦使得部分非法在美居留的人得以重見天日。

sentences.english: He is probably ill, for he is absent today.
sentences.chinese: 他可能生病了，因爲他見天缺席了。

sentences.english: I haven't been in the sun for days.
sentences.chinese: 我已經好幾天不見天日了。

sentences.english: A long-buried side of early Christianity is re-emerging.
sentences.chinese: 如今早期基督教被掩藏已久的那一面正在重見天日。

sentences.english: Some code never sees the light of day. Some code waits a very long time to do its job.
sentences.chinese: 有些代碼從未見天日，有些代碼在運行之前等了N久。

sentences.english: So a lot of these things were rediscovered.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一大批手稿得以重見天日。

sentences.english: I know inside of you there's a nice girl that's just dying to come out.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你內心的那個好女孩快要重見天日了。

sentences.english: Wisdom, like an inheritance, is a good thing and benefits those who see the sun.
sentences.chinese: 智慧和產業並好，而且見天日的人，得智慧更爲有益。

sentences.english: The eyes of the blind shall see the day and the ears of the deaf shall be opened.
sentences.chinese: 盲人之眼必重見天日，聾人之耳必重聞世音。

sentences.english: They were covered up and never retrieved.
sentences.chinese: 他們被埋起來永不見天日。

sentences.english: I have walked through the tunnel but I still can't see the light.
sentences.chinese: 我走過隧道，但我仍然可以不見天日。
